general_advisory: Dry weather condition is expected in upcoming days, so farmers are advised to conduct agricultural operation (irrigation, spraying, intercultural operation etc.) during that period. Sowing of green fodder should be advised to avail proper diet to animals. Farmers should start nursery sowing and planting of Cole crops and other winter season vegetable. Deworming and vaccination against Foot and Mouth Disease and Brucellosis should be advised in animals.

advisory: Farmers should maintain adequate moisture in rice field by applying one irrigation because there is very less chance of rainfall in upcoming days.
To control gall midge attack in rice field, farmers should spray Lambda-cyhalothrin 05% EC, thiamethoxam 25% WG, Fipronil 5% SC, or Chloropyriphos 20 EC in clear and calm weather condition.
To control leaf folder, spraying of Chlorantraniliprole, Tetraniliprole, or Flubendiamide in clear weather.
To control bollworm complex in cotton crop, farmers are advised to spray Emamectin benzoate 5% SG or Profenophos 50% EC in clear weather.
Farmers shouldn't spray any chemical insecticides at flowering period.
To control Fruit and shoot borer in Okra, spraying of Neem based pesticide should be advised at initial stages.
In severe cases, the alternate spray of Spinosad should be advised.
Nursery bed should be prepared with proper dimensions and appropriate fertilizers.
Where irrigation facilities are available, planting of crop is advised in already prepared field.
Training, pruning, and cleaning of weed, diseased and infected branches and leaves should be advised in old Mango orchards.
In newly planted mango orchards, appropriate insecticide sprays should be advised.
Preventive measures and control strategies for Foot and Mouth Disease in Cow and Buffalo should be followed as mentioned in the advisory.
